page.title: 19CHARNES ESTATE BROUGHTON
page.content: MUCH OF THE LARCH AND PINE IS THEN PEELED AND IMPREGNATED WITH COPPER SULPHATE BEFORE BEING USED IN RE-FENCING THE ESTATE.THERE ARE 23 COTTAGES BELONGING TO THE ESTATE.OF THESE 18 ARE LIVED IN BY EITHER THOSE WHO WORK ON THE FARM,AT THE HALL OR ARE NOW RETIRED FROM THE ESTATE THE REST ARE RENTED OUT.MOST OF THE COTTAGES HAVE BEEN MODERNISED IN RECENT YEARS AND ARE RE-PAINTED EVERY 5 YEARS.THE ESTATE POSSESES SEVERAL BOREHOLES WHICH PROVIDE MUCH OF THE VILLAGE WITH A FRESH WATER SUPPLY THE LEVEL AT THE MAIN BOREHOLE IS CHECKED DAILY. THE ESTATE OFFICE IS THE NERVE CENTRE.THE 2 SECRETARIES ( ONE ABOUT TO RETIRE AFTER 65 YEARS ) COPE WITH THE BOOKS AND ACCOUNTS,ALSO HERE IS THE BASE UNIT OF A RADIO TELEPHONE SYSTEM WHERE KEY MEMBERS OF THE ESTATE CAN INTER-COMMUNICATE,
